value.excerpt: StarCraft 2 Battle Royale 6-man free-for-all between Maru, SuperNova, Taeja, Stats, Patience and Ragnarok. value.excerpt: Stargazers managed to take fourth place at the most recent StarCraft 2 Map Contest (TLMC 16). There's a good chance that this map will be used in future SC2 tournaments. value.title: StarCraft 2: WHO CALLED IN THE FLEET? (Dark vs TY)
value.excerpt: Dark versus TY in an epic game of StarCraft 2. In this game of top-level StarCraft we see TY play a different approach than most Terrans do at this level. A lot of Terran players enjoy playing a late-game composition based around the Thor at the moment, but TY decides to focus on a Battlecruiser army

value.excerpt: *NEW SHOW* Guess the MMR: PiG will attempt to guess your exact MMR! Send your replay to RateMyStarcraft@gmail.com with "Guess the MMR" in the title + in the body add your IGN & MMR & region (e.g. Maru, 3600, EU).
